title: gcn.notices.core.AlertInfo
description: Alert Information description properties of this notice

alert_datetime.description: Date and time of notice creation [UTC, ISO 8601]

alert_tense.description: Indication of whether this alert refers to a recent observation (current), re-analysis of archival data (archival), or a planned observation in the future (planned)

alert_type.description: Indication of alert sequence if multiple of same type sent
